title: Oracle VBCS Developer
description:
**BASIC PURPOSE:** 




 The Oracle VBCS/OIC Developer will be responsible for developing/enhancing applications utilizing the Oracle Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS) technology. The developer will collaborate with functional/technical leads and other implementation team members to execute the implementation strategy and ensure that applications/dashboards are developed according to technical specifications. The developer may also develop integrations utilizing Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC).
 



  





**ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:** 



* Create/enhance applications, extensions, and dashboards using Visual Builder Cloud Service (VBCS)
* Create/enhance integrations using Oracle Integration Cloud (OIC).
* Build interactive content in VBCS to facilitate processing and monitoring of key integrations.
* Develop scalable and reusable components in VBCS
* Utilize various integration methods including REST/SOAP services, XML/JSON/flat file payloads, and other common adapters.
* Integrate with internal/external systems both into and out of Oracle ERP including, but not limited to, the following modules: Financials (AP, AR, PPM), HCM (Time \\& Labor, Payroll, Absences)
* Execute tasks in support of the overall implementation strategy, working closely with the functional, technical, and development teams/leads.
* Test, diagnose, and optimize performance of VBCS pages and OIC integrations.
* Ensure error handling, logging mechanisms, and troubleshooting capabilities are incorporated into all solutions.
* Validate the integrated data to ensure it is correct, complete, and consistent with expected results.
* Create technical documentation, e.g., TDDs, migration documentation, and troubleshooting guides.
* Provide general guidance on design and integration solutions.
* Collaborate with all stakeholders to support development, testing, and go\\-live tasks.
* Adhere to system development and integration best practices.
* All other duties as assigned.



***Must be able to perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation.***




  





**QUALIFICATIONS:** 



* Bachelor’s degree in information systems/technology, or a related field is desired.
* Relevant Oracle certifications are strongly preferred but not required.
* 5\\+ years developing with VBCS.
* 3\\+ years developing integrations using OIC.
* 5\\+ years working with Oracle Cloud ERP/HCM
* Functional knowledge of the source/target modules. This includes, but is not limited to, Core HR/HCM, OTL, Payroll, Absences, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Billing, PPM.
* Technical knowledge of the underlying/supporting interface, error, processing, and validation tables.



  





**SKILLS:** 



* Strong technical and analytical skills required
* Effective communication skills to explain integration concepts and solutions.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills, including the comfort and ability to present to both functional and technical stakeholders.
* Excellent time management and organizational skills.
